mapper.select: SELECT g.id,g.goods_name as goodsName,g.brand_name as brandName,g.specs, IFNULL(qin.inStockNum, 0) - IFNULL(qout.orderNum, 0) AS allowance FROM goods g LEFT JOIN ( select goods_id,sum(num) as inStockNum from instock i where i.shop_id = #{shopId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and i.data_flag = 1 GROUP BY i.goods_id ) qin ON g.id = qin.goods_id LEFT JOIN ( select goods_id,sum(o.num) as orderNum from order_sys o where shop_id = #{shopId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and data_flag = 1 GROUP BY o.goods_id ) qout ON g.id= qout.goods_id

select g.id, g.goods_name as goodsName,DATE_FORMAT(i.instock_time,'%Y-%m') as instockTime,i.allwance from goods g LEFT JOIN ( SELECT goods_id,instock_time,sum(num) as allwance from instock where shop_id = #{shopId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and data_flag = 1 and YEAR(instock_time) = YEAR(NOW()) GROUP BY instock_time,goods_id) i on g.id = i.goods_id ORDER BY instockTime asc
